title: Lazar Markovic expected to leave Liverpool on Deadline Day
description: Liverpool expect Lazar Markovic to leave Anfield on Deadline Day with a number of domestic and European clubs in for the winger, say Sky sources.
content: Wolfsburg were trying to persuade Markovic to reignite his career with the Bundesliga club, however, the player's destination is yet to be decided.Swansea had enquired about a move, either on loan or permanent, for the 23-year-old Serb but are understood to be losing confidence over securing a deal with Wolfsburg left as the main option open for him to secure football away from Anfield.Markovic has spent time on loan at Fenerbahce, Hull and Sporting Lisbon since being signed by Brendan Rodgers in the summer of 2014.Jurgen Klopp has already sold Philippe Coutinho to Barcelona for £146m and allowed Daniel Sturridge to join West Brom on loan for the remainder of the season.During his four-year spell with the Merseyside club, the Serbia international has made 34 appearances, scoring three goals.Get Sky Sports from £18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
